typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ntt_correlation as string,
		ntt_breathingspacemoratoriumid as string,
		owningbusinessunit as string,
		ntt_customauditid as string,
		ntt_name as string,
		statecode as string,
		statuscode as string,
		createdby as string,
		timezoneruleversionnumber as string,
		ntt_newvalue as string,
		ntt_order as string,
		ntt_attributemodifiedon as string,
		ownerid as string,
		modifiedon as string,
		owninguser as string,
		modifiedby as string,
		ntt_action as string,
		createdon as string,
		ntt_displayname as string,
		ntt_originalvalue as string,
		ntt_breathingspacedebtorid as string,
		intBatchId as integer,
		partdist as date,
		blIsValid as boolean,
		tsModifiedOn as timestamp,
		tsCreatedOn as timestamp,
		strNTTCustomAuditId as string,
		strNTTBreathingSpaceDebtId as string,
		strNTTBreathingSpaceMoratoriumId as string,
		blIsTruncate as boolean,
		strINSSDebtTypeId as string,
		strNTTOriginalValue as string,
		strNTTNewValue as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	format: 'parquet') ~> sourceValidation
sourceValidation select(mapColumn(
		ntt_correlation,
		ntt_breathingspacemoratoriumid,
		owningbusinessunit,
		ntt_customauditid,
		ntt_name,
		statecode,
		statuscode,
		createdby,
		timezoneruleversionnumber,
		ntt_newvalue,
		ntt_order,
		ntt_attributemodifiedon,
		ownerid,
		modifiedon,
		owninguser,
		modifiedby,
		ntt_action,
		createdon,
		ntt_displayname,
		ntt_originalvalue,
		ntt_breathingspacedebtorid,
		intBatchId,
		partdist,
		blIsValid,
		tsModifiedOn,
		tsCreatedOn,
		strNTTCustomAuditId,
		strNTTBreathingSpaceDebtId,
		strNTTBreathingSpaceMoratoriumId,
		blIsTruncate,
		strINSSDebtTypeId,
		strNTTOriginalValue,
		strNTTNewValue
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumns
SelectColumns alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRowSink
AlterRowSink sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'curation',
	folderPath: 'ods/bss/dynamics/references-bss/customaudit',
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['strNTTCustomAuditId'],
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		partdist
	)) ~> sinkODS
